cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 9th Dec 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 9th Dec 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: It is a private and spacious studio apartment. Guest will have an entire apartment. This apartment features 2 single beds, 1 en suite bathroom and a kitchenette. Please note that the maximum occupancy is 2.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: It is a private and spacious studio apartment. Guest will have an entire apartment. This apartment features one double bed, one en suite bathroom and a kitchenette. Please note that the maximum occupancy is 2.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard 6 Bed Apartment Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: This apartment features 3 lockable rooms, 1 bathroom, a living area and a kitchenette. Bedroom one has one double bed, Bedroom two has one double bed and Bedroom there has one double bed. Please note that the maximum occupancy is 4 guests .

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
